page.title: 02GOVERNMENT AND POLITICS
page.content:
Cranham,Upminster,has a 4 tier system of representation. {European Parliament:Carole Tongue (Labour) {House of Commons:Sir Nicholas Bonsor (Conservative) {Greater London Council:Tony Bays (Conservative) {Havering Borough Council:4 Independent {Ratepayer Councillors.
Local Councillors are elected every 4 years. The Havering Borough Council is responsible for the general running of the borough and provides many services such as schools,libraries,housing, roads,social services and recreational facilities. Our local Council Offices known as the Town Hall are in Romford and were built in 1936.
